Lieut. Christy Mathewson, Jr.
Sailing Tonight For America
Lieutenant
Mathewson's recupe-
ration following his operation has
been so
rapid, it
was learned to-
day, that he has been
up
and

deal

and
more.
He is taking his
crutches
along,
but as yet is
unable to use them
as the left shoulder still
is weak
from the injuries
received
in
the
crash.
